General.Name: Zhonghong Pulin Medical Products Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Zhonghong Pulin Medical Products Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of disposable health protection gloves. Its products include disposable nitrile gloves, disposable PVC gloves, disposable PVC sets, and dual channel syringe pumps used in food, medical, industrial, and other fields. It also provides health protection products, including medical exam and surgical gloves, disposable protective gloves, condoms, check medical cots, and medical radiation protective gloves; safe infusion products; and incubation products, comprising portable electronic pain relief pump, enternal nutrition pump, and infusion pumps. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Tangshan, China.
